definition: to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: We can overcome the mind - set through consolidating …
sentences.chinese: 強化理性思維，優化思維方式則可克服心理定勢。

sentences.english: MacLauchlan, 2005. ). An advertising objective may be to change the mind-set of the customers.
sentences.chinese: 廣告的目的可能是改變顧客的思維定勢。

sentences.english: Here are 11 ways to beef up your out-of-the-box thinking skills.
sentences.chinese: 這裏我們介紹11種方法，幫助你摒棄定勢思維。

sentences.english: This kind of thinking frames our sense of the natural order.
sentences.chinese: 這種思維定勢構成了我們對自然秩序的認識。

sentences.english: The doctrine of linguistic behavior broke free from traditional cognitive mode of language expression.
sentences.chinese: 語言行爲說打破了語言表達論的傳統認識定勢。
